overview: Some pretty filthy stuff comes out of the mouths of college babes. Campus Confessions #6 eavesdrops on the sex-filled lives of America's naughtiest coeds. Wanna see something too hot for TV? Well' do you one better. These sexual antics are so red-hot that most porn companies are afraid to touch them! Straight from the whore's mouth hear (and see) tales of anal action, cock-swallowing and messy facials. Think you've seen everything? Don't bet on it. Campus Confessions #6 is a hardcore eye-opener.
title: Campus Confessions 6
